title: Bonus! From our friends at AirSpace: Mask, Gloves, Soap, Scrubs
description: AirSpace from the Smithsonian’s National Air and Space Museum is a podcast that helps you discover news, entertainment, and inspiration in the sky. In other words, we tell aspirational stories about defying gravity. Whether you’re an avid aviation geek, space cadet, or just somebody who loves great stories about smart topics, join hosts Emily, Matt, and Nick and spend a little time with your head in the clouds.
itunes:subtitle: As important as cleanliness is here on Earth, it’s really, really important when you’re headed for outer space.
author: wgbh_podcasts@wgbh.org (NOVA NOW)
itunes:author: NOVA NOW
